about.heroSubtitle: From Southeast Asia to the world, at your fingertips
about.storyPara1: Wanderlust was founded with a simple mission: Make travel easy and affordable for everyone. We believe everyone deserves to explore the world.
about.storyPara2: With over 10 years of experience in the travel industry, we have served over 1 million customers, helping them create memorable experiences around the world.
about.missionDesc: Deliver excellent and easy travel experiences for everyone, connecting you with the world.
about.teamDesc: Professional team with years of experience in travel and technology industries.
about.qualityDesc: Committed to top-quality service with the most competitive prices in the market.
about.globalDesc: Connecting over 10,000 destinations worldwide, from Southeast Asia to Europe and America.

offers.parisExclusive: Exclusive Paris getaway! Save 20% on your dream trip!
offers.parisDescription: Start an unforgettable journey to the romantic city of Paris, France, with our exclusive limited-time offer! Immerse yourself in the charm of the City of Light while enjoying amazing 20% savings on your entire trip!
offers.subscribeForDeals: Subscribe to receive special offer notifications

topUp.title: Top Up Wallet
topUp.subtitle: Add money for transactions on Wanderlust
topUp.termsAgreement: By clicking "Top Up", you agree to our
topUp.faq1Question: 💳 How long does it take for money to reach the wallet?
topUp.faq1Answer: Money will be credited to your wallet
topUp.faq2Question: 💰 Are there any fees for topping up?
topUp.faq2Answer: Wanderlust offers completely free wallet top-up transactions
topUp.faq3Question: 🔄 Can I withdraw money from the wallet?
topUp.faq3Answer: Yes. You can request to withdraw money to your bank account in "My Wallet" → "Withdraw". Processing time is 1-3 business days
topUp.faq4Question: 🛡️ Is the money in the wallet safe?
topUp.faq4Answer: Absolutely safe. The wallet is protected by advanced encryption technology and complies with international security standards
topUp.selectAmountAndMethod: Please enter amount and select payment method
